question_text: Which two statements describe characteristics of DB9 and RS232 communication? (Select two)
answer_options: It uses multi-gigabit symmetric signaling for video
It requires precise timing configurations like baud rate
It is commonly used for configuring headless devices
It automatically negotiates communication protocols like USB
It is the preferred method for HDMI console control
correct_answer: It requires precise timing configurations like baud rate
It is commonly used for configuring headless devices
explanation: RS232 requires manual config (baud, parity, etc.) and is frequently used with headless systems like routers and switches via console ports.
